# Schwarzbach (Ried)

Schwarzbach () is a river of the Hessian Ried, Hesse, Germany. It is a right tributary of the Rhine in Ginsheim. Including its right source river Gundbach, it is 43.5 km long.
See also
*List of rivers of Hesse
